name: Jump or Die: Adventure Iceland
description:
From the makers of the most addictive game pin circle pro over Android here we present the super fun Jump or die.
Jump or die is a story of Simpson who is alone there in the ice village. It is a fun run game over the icy world.
Jump or die is a super fun game while on a busy schedule. Don't give it up and jump all over the tiles to make Simpson run and let's see how much you can score. Don't

tap at wrong time and help Simpson to enter the new world. Take him over the ice hop adventure. Jump or die is a super ice hop game.
In Jump or die don't fall on the bush as he will die. So don't give it up Jump or die has simple control with single tap!
If tapped incorrectly then Simpson will die.

If you are on a move, in office or stressed take pause for refreshment with jump or die and make Simpson run over the tiles. Don't give it up live refresh with jump !

Jump or die motive:
• Entertain the user
• Train your brain
• To refresh user from stress

Game Features:
• Make simpson run and jump over the tiles
• Don't tap at wrong time
• Single tap game
• Complete stress buster
• Challenging game
• Lovely games graphics
• Easy and fun ice hop game.

Play jump or die with family and friends and enjoy with our character Simpson!
